## LayoutMappingDirective interface

Type of the LayoutMapping metadata.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LayoutMappingDirective 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./component-api.layoutmappingdirective.id.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | Type IDs or content IDs to map this to |
|  [kind](./component-api.layoutmappingdirective.kind.md) | <code>CONTENT_ITEM_KIND &#124; CONTENT_ITEM_KIND[]</code> | Type IDs to map this to |
|  [layoutMode](./component-api.layoutmappingdirective.layoutmode.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | An optional layout mode used with this layout mapping. |
|  [selector](./component-api.layoutmappingdirective.selector.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | Defines the mapping between the layout controller to the layout implementation. If this property is missing, the selector of the component will be used instead. |
